cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters, create a 2/2 white Peasant creature token, a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying, and a Clue token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Creature tokens you control have skulk. [i](They can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
Abilities of noncreature tokens you activate cost {1} less to activate.

Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, each opponent loses 1 life and you create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to each player.
As long as your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, this creature gets +2/+1 and has menace.

Whenever you expend 5, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
Whenever you expend 8, this creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.

This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.

Spells you cast that target a creature cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, this creature gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.

This enchantment enters with three charge counters on it.
Remove a charge counter from this enchantment: Add one mana of any color. Activate only once each turn.
Whenever you expend 5, target player mills four cards. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]

When this artifact enters, exile the top card of your library and up to one noncreature card from your graveyard. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {1} less to cast.
Create two 1/1 white Ally creature tokens.

Whenever a creature card leaves your graveyard for the first time each turn, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
Whenever a noncreature card leaves your graveyard for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

When this creature enters, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.
{2}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Lifelink
When this creature dies, draw a card.
Create three 2/2 white Peasant creature tokens with vigilance. Scry 3.
Whenever one or more tokens you control enter, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Flying
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]

As long as you control a token, this creature gets +2/+1.
Cache {2} [i]({2}, Exile this card from your hand: Draw a card. You can cast this later by also discarding a card.)[/i]
Create a 1/1 white Mouse creature token, then create an additional one of those tokens for each Calamity card in your graveyard.

Vigilance
Whenever you expend 5, this creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]

Flying
Whenever this creature enters, return target creature or enchantment card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Cache {2} [i]({2}, Exile this card from your hand: Draw a card. You can cast this later by also discarding a card.)[/i]

When this creature enters, create a 1/1 white Ally creature token.
[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Exile target nonland permanent with X plus 1 doom counters on it, where X is the number of Calamity cards in your graveyard. Its controller may cast it for as long as it remains exiled, and it costs {1} more to cast for each doom counter on it.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can’t be blocked as long as it has power 2 or less. Otherwise, it can’t attack or block.

This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a tapped creature.
Destroy target creature.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to target creature or planeswalker this turn. If that permanent is a creature, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return this Aura to its owner’s hand.

Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Flashback {3}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is an Ally in addition to its other types.
When this creature enters, create a Clue token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

When this creature enters and whenever you expend 5, target player mills three cards. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
{T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells.

Flying
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, this creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever a token you control enters, this creature can’t be blocked this turn.

Hexproof

This creature can’t attack unless a player has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
Cache {2} [i]({2}, Exile this card from your hand: Draw a card. You can cast this later by also discarding a card.)[/i]
Counter target spell. Its controller mills three cards.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard.

Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
Flashback {2}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
Draw a card. Create a Clue token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Target player draws three cards.
Cache {U} [i]({U}, Exile this card from your hand: Draw a card. You can cast this later by also discarding a card.)[/i]
Target nonland permanent’s owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library. Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and another target creature gets -2/-0.
Target player mills three cards. Then that player mills an additional two cards for each Calamity card in your graveyard.
Whenever you expend 5, this creature gets +3/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]

Vigilance
When this creature enters, draw a card if a creature you control dealt combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn.

Deathtouch
{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Each player mills a card.
{5}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

When this creature enters, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. 
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Calamity card in your graveyard.

Whenever you expend 5, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]

Mill two cards. When you do, choose target creature you control and target creature you don’t control. The creature you control gets +1/+1 for each nonland card milled this way. Then it fights target creature you don’t control.

Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Flashback {2}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each player mills three cards. [i](They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)[/i]

Each player mills four cards, then you may choose a creature and/or a land card in a graveyard. Return each card chosen this way to its owner’s hand.
Cache {G} [i]({G}, Exile this card from your hand: Draw a card. You can cast this later by also discarding a card.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying {3}{G}{G} rather than its mana cost.

Choose one—
• Gratuitous Grasp deals three times X damage to target creature with flying.
• Target creature you control gets +0/+X and gains reach and hexproof until end of turn.

You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield
Draw a card.

Choose two—
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Shuffle up to five cards from your graveyard into your library.
• Draw a card.

{1}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only once each turn.

Trample

As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {1} or 2 life.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a card in your graveyard that was put there from anywhere this turn.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

Whenever one or more nontoken cards are put into your graveyard from your hand, your library, or the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, each opponent loses 2 life.

Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of Calamity cards in your graveyard. It fights up to one target creature you don’t control. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]

Trample
When this creature enters, scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. You gain life equal to that card’s mana value.

This creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature.

When this artifact enters, mill three cards.
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, put growth counter on this artifact.
{T}: Add {G} for each growth counter on this artifact.
Surveil 2, then draw a card.
Until end of turn, if one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

Exile the top X cards of target player’s library, where X is 1 plus the number of Calamity cards in your graveyard. Choose one of them. For as long as that card remains exiled, you may play it, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

Combat damage that would be dealt by creatures you control can’t be prevented.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.
When this creature enters, you may search your library for a card with mana value 5 or greater, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only this creature, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

This creature enters with an additional flying counter on it if X is 1 or more, an additional +1/+1 counter on it if X is 2 or more, an additional vigilance counter on it if X is 3 or more, an additional first strike counter on it if X is 4 or more, and and additional lifelink counter on it if X is 5 or more.

When this artifact enters, exile target card from a graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile each opponent’s graveyard.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{X}, {T}, Exile this artifact, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Create an X/X colorless Horror creature token.

Spells you cast that target Allies you control cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, untap those creatures. If it’s your combat phase, there’s an additional combat phase after this one.

Double strike
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell during each of their turns, draw a card unless that player pays {X}, where X is Feyrouse, Beacon of Defiance’s power.
Whenever you expend 5, put a +1/+1 counter on Feyrouse. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
Whenever you expend 8, create a True Conviction token. [i](It’s a {3}{W}{W}{W} enchantment with “Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.”)[/i]

Vigilance
Whenever this creature attacks, if another Ally is attacking, you draw a card and you gain 1 life.

Choose one—
• Destroy all Ally creatures.
• Destroy all non-Ally creatures.

When this enchantment enters, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token with lifelink and a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 for each noncreature token you control.

{2}{W}{W}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token with lifelink.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 10 life, have exactly seven cards in hand, and control exactly one creature, you win the game.

When this creature enters, create two 2/2 blue Bird Ally creature tokens with flying.
[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, scry 1, then draw a card.

Whenever you draw your second card during each of your turns, put two time counters on this enchantment.
Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on this enchantment.

Flying
Whenever you expend 5, scry 5. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
Whenever you expend 8, reveal cards from the top of your library until the total mana value of cards revealed this way is 8 or greater. Put those cards into your hand.
At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent mills three cards, then you draw a card for each land card put into their graveyard this way.

At the beginning of your draw step, if the number of cards in your library is less than half your starting deck size, draw an additional card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if the number of cards in your library is less than a quarter of your starting deck size, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.
Return up to X target nonland permanents to their owners’ hands, where X is one plus the number of Calamity cards in your graveyard.
[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, non-Ally creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

This spell costs {X} more to cast, where X is your life total.

Cache {2} [i]({2}, Exile this card from your hand: Draw a card. You can cast this later by also discarding a card.)[/i]

Menace
Whenever you expend 5, target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
Whenever you expend 8, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

This creature’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, you may draw a card.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, discard a card.

Return to your hand all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn.
Exile Delve the Unraveled.

This spell costs {1}{B} less to cast if your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total.
Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

The March of Death deals 1 damage to any target. You gain 1 life. Then if you’ve cast thirteen or more spells named The March of Death this game, a player of your choice loses the game.
Flashback {1}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
{1}{B}: Put this card from exile into your hand.

[i]Stalwart[/i] — Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more Allies you control, if that spell is targeting only a single Ally you control, copy it for each other Ally creature you control. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures. Otherwise, copy that spell once and you may choose new targets for the copy. If a spell copied this way is a permanent spell, the copies gain “At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent.”
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. This creature deals damage to you equal to its mana value. You may play it this turn.

Flying, haste
Whenever you expend 5, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]

Haste
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a token that’s a copy of Xanpef, Paradox Fragment, except it’s not legendary. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

Whenever you attack, add {R} for each attacking creature. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Whenever you expend 15, put a domination counter on this enchantment.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if this enchantment has a domination counter on it, you win the game.
Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

Whenever this creature enters or attacks, choose one that hasn’t been chosen this turn—
• Create a 4/4 green Wurm creature token.
• Creatures you control gain trample and indestructible until end of turn.
• Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent.
• This creature fights target creature you don’t control.

Whenever you expend 5, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
Whenever you expend 8, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Slymel, Primal Invoker’s power and toughness until end of turn.

When this creature enters, choose one—
• Destroy target artifact.
• Exile target player’s graveyard.
Activated abilities of artifacts and cards in graveyards can’t be activated.

When this enchantment enters, mill four cards.
Whenever one or more creatures attack you or a planeswalker you control, you may exile a basic land card from your graveyard. If you do, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Otherwise, sacrifice this enchantment.
Put all basic land cards from target player’s graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control.
At the beginning of each opponent’s end step, if you didn’t lose life this turn, that opponent gets a poison counter. [i](A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)[/i]
Return each creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is 1 plus the number of Calamity cards in your graveyard.

Kicker {5} [i](You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Create a token that’s a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

Destroy up to X target creatures and/or planeswalkers, where X is one plus the number of Calamity cards in your graveyard. Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is three plus the number of Calamity cards in your graveyard. You may put any number of creature cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.
The next creature spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. That creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Target nonland permanent phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don’t exist until its controller’s next turn.)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Moment deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Choose target creature. Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with equal or lesser power.

Whenever one or more creatures become the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on [i]Er[/i]-Corress, Oblivion Priest.
{WB}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from [i]Er[/i]-Corress: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 colorless Horror creature token.
{1}{W}{B}, Pay 3 life, Remove four +1/+1 counters from [i]Er[/i]-Corress: Exile target nonland permanent.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Surveil 3.
[-2]: You may cast target instant, sorcery, or Aura card from your graveyard this turn if that spell targets a creature you control. If an instant or sorcery spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
[-8]: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Each of them is a 2/2 Zombie Ally in addition to its other types.

Ward—Pay 3 life. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)[/i]
Whenever one or more creatures cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the greatest mana value among them.

cards.special_text:

[-3]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+0.”

Whenever Caljak, Shadow of the End attacks, put a face-up exiled card into its owner’s graveyard. If that card is an artifact card, Caljak gains indestructible until end of turn. If that card is a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Caljak. If that card is an enchantment card, Caljak gains deathtouch until end of turn. If that card is a land card, you gain 3 life. If that card is none of those types, draw a card.
